Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP48.server.networkmanager

Class ClientHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP48.server.networkmanager.ClientHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class ClientHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
Handles the message send to a player To avoid synchronization problems, a new send can't be requested until the previous one is completed. All the request send methods wait for the previous message to be send

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    ClientHandler​(java.net.Socket client, ClientHandlerListener i)
    Initializes the handler object

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void changedBoard​(java.util.ArrayList<Cell> newCells)
    Requests the send of a message that notify the client that some cells' content has changed
    void changedPlayerList​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> newPlayerList)
    Requests the send of a message that notify the client the player list changed, even if a player'd divinity changed
    void gameEndMessage​(java.lang.String message)
    Request the send of a message that notify the client the game ended
    void handleClientDisconnection()
    Handles the disconnection of a client setting the message sender in a shutdown state and waking up the thread form waiting for messages to be sent
    void replyPing()
    Requests the reply to a ping message
    void requestBuild​(java.util.ArrayList<WorkerValidCells> build, java.util.ArrayList<WorkerValidCells> dome)
    Requests the send of a message that notify the client to request the player to do a construction action
    void requestChallengerDivinitiesSelection​(java.util.ArrayList<DivinitiesWithDescription> div, int playerNumber)
    Requests the send of a message that notify the challenger's client to ask the player to select the divinities available for the game
    void requestDivinitySelection​(java.util.ArrayList<DivinitiesWithDescription> availableDivinities)
    Requests the send of a message that notify the client to request its player to select his divinity
    void requestInitialPlayerSelection​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> players)
    Requests the send of a message that notify the challenger's client to request the player the first player of the game
    void requestInitialPositioning​(java.util.ArrayList<Position> validCells)
    Requests the send of a message that notify a client to request its player to put his worker on the board
    void requestMessageSend​(java.lang.String message)
    Requests the send of a message that notify the client to display a message
    void requestMove​(java.util.ArrayList<WorkerValidCells> validCellsForMove)
    Requests the send of a message that notify to request the player to do a move action
    void requestOptionalBuild​(java.util.ArrayList<WorkerValidCells> build, java.util.ArrayList<WorkerValidCells> dome)
    Requests the send of a message that notify the client to request the player to do an optional build, or to skip it

    Requests the send of a message that notify the client to request the player to do an optional move, or to skip it

      Parameters:
      validCellsForMove - the list of workers that can complete the move, associated with the cells where it can move
